title: Public Portfolio Homepage Load and Render
description: Verify that the public homepage loads successfully and renders all main sections: hero video auto-playing, project gallery with media cards, client logos carousel, and footer contact info.

steps.description: Navigate to the public portfolio homepage
Check that the hero video is present and auto-playing without user interaction
Verify that the project gallery displays projects in a responsive grid layout with media thumbnails
Confirm presence of client logos carousel with logos visible and animating
Check that the footer displays contact information correctly

title: Project Media Card Interaction and Lightbox Display
description: Ensure that clicking on a project media card opens a lightbox or modal showing the high-resolution image or playing the video.

steps.description: Navigate to the public portfolio homepage
Click on a project media card (image or video thumbnail)
Verify that a lightbox or modal opens displaying the media in high resolution or auto-playing the video
Close the lightbox/modal
Ensure the main page is restored correctly with no unexpected UI artifacts

title: Admin Login and Access to Filament Dashboard
description: Verify admin users can successfully log into the FilamentPHP admin dashboard and access project and client management resources.

steps.description: Navigate to the admin login page
Input valid admin credentials
Submit login form
Confirm successful login and redirection to admin dashboard
Check that project and client management menus/resources are accessible

title: Admin Project CRUD Operations
description: Test creating, editing, and deleting portfolio projects with media uploads, SEO metadata, visibility toggles, and layout selection.

steps.description: Log into admin dashboard
Navigate to Project Management section
Create a new project with title, rich text description, media uploads (images, video), SEO metadata, and select a grid layout
Verify project appears in the project list
Edit the project to change media ordering using drag-and-drop, update visibility toggle to 'Published'
Confirm changes are saved and reflected in admin UI
Delete the created project
Verify the project is removed from the list

title: Admin Client Logo Management CRUD
description: Verify admin can create, edit, reorder, and delete client logos for the client carousel with website URLs and visibility toggles.

steps.description: Log into admin dashboard
Navigate to Client Management section
Create a new client logo with image upload, website URL, and visibility set to published
Check the new client logo displays in the client list
Reorder client logos using drag-and-drop
Confirm order change persists after save and on public site
Edit client details to update URL and toggle visibility to draft
Verify visibility toggle hides client logo from public carousel
Delete the created client logo
Confirm client logo removed from list and public carousel if published

title: Global Site Settings Management and Reflection
description: Test updating global site settings such as hero video, profile bio, social links, and SEO defaults via the admin singleton settings page and verify changes reflect on the public site.

steps.description: Login to admin dashboard
Access the Global Site Settings page
Update hero video URL, profile bio text, add or remove social links, and modify default SEO metadata
Save changes
Verify success confirmation message
Navigate to public portfolio homepage
Check the updated hero video loads and plays automatically
Profile bio and social links appear correctly in the site footer or appropriate locations
SEO metadata changes are present in the page source meta tags

title: Draft and Published Content Visibility Control
description: Validate that projects and client logos marked as draft are not visible on the public site, whereas published content is publicly accessible.

steps.description: Login as admin and create a new project and client logo set to draft visibility
Confirm draft project and client logo are listed in admin with correct visibility status
Visit public portfolio homepage
Verify that draft project and client logo are not visible anywhere in the public UI
Change visibility to published for both items in admin and save
Reload public portfolio homepage
Verify that the project appears in the project gallery and client logo in the carousel

title: Media Upload Validation and URL Resolution
description: Verify media upload functionality allows supported image and video file types within size limits, and that media URLs resolve correctly for both local filesystem storage and external URLs.

steps.description: In admin project creation, attempt to upload valid image and video files within allowed size ranges
Confirm files are accepted and uploaded successfully
Attempt to upload unsupported file types and files exceeding size limits
Verify an error message is displayed and upload is rejected
Set media URLs manually to external URLs and to local storage paths
Ensure URL resolution logic correctly differentiates and handles external vs local media links on public site

title: Project and Client Drag-and-Drop Reordering Persistence
description: Confirm that drag-and-drop reordering of projects and client logos in admin interface persists on save and is accurately reflected in the frontend display order.

steps.description: Login to admin dashboard
Navigate to project management section
Reorder projects using drag-and-drop and save changes
Verify order saved confirmation
Visit public portfolio homepage
Verify projects display in the new order
Repeat steps for client logos in client management

title: Performance Benchmark for Page Load and Media Lazy Loading
description: Validate that the portfolio homepage meets defined performance benchmarks for page load times and that media elements (images/videos) implement lazy loading to optimize user experience.

steps.description: Navigate to the public homepage on a standard user connection
Measure page load time and verify it meets performance criteria
Verify that project media images and videos are lazy-loaded and not all loaded at initial page render
Check that auto-playing videos in hero and project gallery start playing promptly once in viewport

title: Responsive UI and Accessibility Compliance
description: Verify that the application UI is responsive across common device screen sizes and meets accessibility standards such as proper alt text, keyboard navigation, and ARIA attributes.

steps.description: Access the public homepage on multiple viewport sizes (mobile, tablet, desktop)
Confirm UI components (hero video, project grid, client carousel, footer) adjust layout appropriately and remain usable
Use keyboard navigation to tab through interactive elements on the homepage
Verify all interactive elements have visible focus indicators and are accessible
Inspect images and media elements have meaningful alt attributes
Check ARIA roles and labels are present where appropriate

title: Security: Route and Endpoint Access Control
description: Ensure all admin routes and API endpoints are secured with authentication and authorization checks, preventing unauthorized access.

steps.description: Attempt to access admin dashboard and sensitive CRUD URLs without being authenticated
Verify redirection to login page or access denied response
Login as a user without admin privileges and attempt access to admin routes
Confirm access denied or forbidden response
Login as admin and verify access to all expected routes and API endpoints
